dahaatawani wyawastha sanshodhanaya ek pudgalayaku wata balaya kendragatha karawimata kala salasmak nowana bawath eya rata wisin illa sitinnak bawath agramathya di. mu. jayarathna mahatha pawasiya.wyawastha sanshodhanaye saba aramuna rata sanwardhanayedi balapana nithimaya ha sesu badhaka iwathkaraganima bawath, pawasana agramathyawaraya ehi prathilabha nuduru anagathayedi siyaludenata dakagatha hakibawada kiya.agamathiwaraya me bawa sandahan kale badulla muthiyangana rajamaha wiharasthanaye chaithya maluwata mulgala thabime awasthawata sahabhagi wemini.ehidi adahas dakwu agramathyawaraya meseda kiya. je. aar. jayawardhana mahathage wyawasthawa janathawage subasiddhiya padanam kara sakaskala ekak nowe.

paksha pradhana sanwidhayaka basnahira palath sabha manthri upali gunarathna mahathage yojanawak anuwa gampaha disthrik nayaka aarthika sanwardhana amathi basil rajapaksha mahatha wisin siya amathyanshayen me jala wyapruthiyata mudal laba dena ladi.me nimiththen pawathi uthsawaye di palath sabha manthri upali gunarathna mahatha pawasuwe thama kopamana dompeta wada kalath mathiwarana kalayata manapa chanda illa gena pitathin ena apekshakayanta dompe janathawa rawatena bawaya.

"(1) janadhipathiwaraya wisin prakashayak magin parlimenthuwa kandawima, parlimenthuwe warawasana kirima saha parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harima kala hakke ya: ese wuwada, parlimenthuwa wisin ehi nopamini manthriwarayan da athuluwa mulu manthriwarayange sankhyawen thunen dekakata noadu sankhyawakage yojana sammathayak magin parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harina lesa janadhipathiwarayagen illimak karanu labanne nam misa, parlimenthuwe prathama raswima sandaha niyama kara ganu labu dinayen awurudu hatharak saha masa hayaka kalayak awasan wana thek janadhipathiwaraya wisin parlimenthuwa wisuruwa harima nokala yuththe ya."
